mapper.select: SELECT MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO,MUSICBOARD_GROUPNO,MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ,MUSICBOARD_TITLETAB, MUSICBOARD_DELFLAG,MUSICBOARD_TITLE,MUSICBOARD_CONTENT,MUSICBOARD_WRITER,MUSICBOARD_REGDATE FROM MUSICBOARD ORDER BY MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO DESC, MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ
mapper.update: UPDATE MUSICBOARD SET MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ = MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ+1 WHERE MUSICBOARD_GROUPNO = (SELECT MUSICBOARD_GROUPNO FROM MUSICBOARD WHERE MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO=#{musicbd_boardno}) AND MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ > (SELECT MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ FROM MUSICBOARD WHERE MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO=#{musicbd_boardno})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSICBOARD VALUES(BOARDNOSEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MUSICBOARD_GROUPNO FROM MUSICBOARD WHERE MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO=#{musicbd_boardno}), (SELECT MUSICBOARD_GROUPSQ FROM MUSICBOARD WHERE MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO=#{musicbd_boardno})+1, (SELECT MUSICBOARD_TITLETAB FROM MUSICBOARD WHERE MUSICBOARD_BOARDNO=#{musicbd_boardno})+1, #{musicbd_title},#{musicbd_content},#{musicbd_writer},SYSDATE)
